title: How to Make Grilled Chicken Kabob Salad

steps.headline: Cook the chicken breasts on a stove until they are a golden brown.
Place the baguette and chopped up chicken onto the skewer.
Cook the kabob on a grill in oil.
Combine the rest of the ingredients in a large bowl and stir well.
Refrigerate it for around 5 minutes or just let it rest.
Garnish it with fresh parsley and salt/pepper.

text: Cook the chicken breasts on a stove until they are a golden brown.  Place the baguette and chopped up chicken onto the skewer.  Cook the kabob on a grill in oil.  Combine the rest of the ingredients in a large bowl and stir well.  Refrigerate it for around 5 minutes or just let it rest.  Garnish it with fresh parsley and salt/pepper.
